import Modal from "../UI/Modal" import classes from "./Cart.module.css" import CartContext from "../../store/cart-context" import { useContext } from "react" const Cart = props => { useContext(CartContext) const cartItems = (
    {CartContext.items.map((item) =>
  • {item.name}

) return (
{cartItems}
